categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: Crazy Harry was a Clone Wars veteran droid with a strong personality. He was a pilot for the Star Tours spaceline.

The character of Crazy Harry was the original concept for the pilot droid in Disney's Star Tours simulator ride. The idea of the "gung-ho veteran" pilot was later softened to become the nervous, rookie pilot RX-24, that guests could more empathize with.
He shares a name with the Muppet Crazy Harry.
